ct: 正在用东芝看着贴，难道要把它砸了？<img&nbsp;border=\"0\"&nbsp;alt=\"\"&nbsp;src=\"/mod/kd/plugins/emoticons/images/jx2/j_0009.gif\"&nbsp;/><img&nbsp;border=\"0\"&nbsp;alt=\"\"&nbsp;src=\"/mod/kd/plugins/emoticons/images/jx2/j_0004.gif\"&nbsp;/><img&nbsp;border=\"0\"&nbsp;alt=\"\"&nbsp;src=\"/mod/kd/plugins/emoticons/images/jx2/j_0041.gif\"&nbsp;/>
